Node.definition: = man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= a type of song (שִׁיר) probably to be accompanied by musical instruments
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer
= action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity
= the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= causative action by which humans or deities make objects or (other) humans different from what they were before
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
= a low stool; ► for resting the feet on when sitting; ≈ often associated with authority

= the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and by extension of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= stick ◄ usually made of wood; ► used for walking or as attribute of a ruler; also used for threshing; ≈ associated with authority and punishment
= state in which a person, supernatural being, animal, substance, or force has the ability to exert great force
= action by which humans stretch out their hand, which holds an object, in order to do something with that object
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= mountain; ► that part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of David (דָּוִד) YHWH's dwelling place

Node.gloss: to rule|to have charge|to have dominion
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities exercise authority over (other) humans, animals, and areas, often with focus on the manner in which this is done
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
= state in which humans are willing to perform a certain task and show that by their actions

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

= state in which a human being, animal, or deity is deemed worthy of respect because of characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof|= an organized military force equipped for fighting on land; this term denotes primarily the foot soldiers, though it can also be used to refer to the entire fighting force, including chariots and horsemen
= state in which deities, humans, or animals have personal greatness and a high status, recognized and respected by others
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals

= part of the lower body of women and mammals where offspring are conceived and in which they grow until their birth; ≈ sometimes extended to refer to a woman, the time of birth, the place where something is produced, and the innermost part of an area
= condensed moisture resulting from contact of air and cooler land surfaces; ►an important source of water for vegetation; ≈ regarded as refreshing, life enhancing; associated with fertility
= state in which humans are still relatively young
= action by which humans or deities make a solemn statement often calling on a higher power to confirm that what is said is true or to punish the speaker if it turns out not to be true
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state by which humans or deities are having second thoughts about past actions or plans for the future
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
exact meaning unsure; possibly: = a certain role or pattern of behavior
= man; ► king of Salem (שָׁלֵם) who blessed Abram (אַבְרָם) when he returned from defeating the kings of the East
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun
= causative action by which an army gains the upper hand over an opposing army with a total victory

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= state of extreme displeasure; ≈ often associated with fire and smoke
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

Node.gloss: to judge|to pass judgment|to vindicate|to rule
Node.definition: = action by which someone gives a verdict on a case or person in a dispute and ensures that the verdict is implemented, which, ideally, results in relief for the innocent and punishment for the guilty; this can only be done by someone in authority, such as a judge or ruler or even God himself

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= causative action by which someone causes a certain location, container, or surface to be filled or covered with so many objects that little or no space is left
= the physical structure, including the bones, flesh, and organs, of a person or animal, either alive or dead
= causative action by which an army gains the upper hand over an opposing army with a total victory
literally: head; hence: = the person in leadership of a group of people, or, by extension, the most important object among a set of objects

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= a relatively steep and narrow valley following the course of a stream, which is often dry, except for the rainy season
literally: road; hence: = action by which humans are travelling from one place to another

Node.gloss: to lift up (one's) head > to find new courage
Node.definition: literally: to lift up (one's) head; hence: = process by which humans find new confidence

Node.gloss: to lift up (one's) head > to look up with confidence
Node.definition: literally: to lift up (one's) head; hence: = action by which humans look up without shame
